title: GROWING WHILE STAYING ROOTED
description: On April 1st, 1989 ALAS doo was founded in Zrenjanin, Serbia, at that point leading information technology developing center in Serbia. Considering the company was named after Mihailo Petrovic Alas, influential Serbian mathematician and inventor, the principal idea was computer engineering. Since then, ALAS doo, continues to provide expert custom solutions to emerging businesses, and large enterprises. Catering to the growing need for qualified developers globally; ALAS doo is now one of the most reliable outsourcing companies. With our firm faith in quality and reliability, we continue to grow slowly but steadily.
